brands.name: LG
brands.description: Expert LG appliance repair service for all models

services.title: LG Refrigerator Repair
services.description: Fix Linear Compressor issues, ice maker problems, cooling failures, and InstaView door malfunctions.

services.title: LG Washer Repair
services.description: Resolve OE, UE, and LE error codes, TurboWash problems, and Wi-Fi connectivity issues.

services.title: LG Dryer Repair
services.description: Repair heating problems, sensor dry issues, and TurboSteam malfunctions in all LG dryers.

services.title: LG Dishwasher Repair
services.description: Service QuadWash systems, fix cleaning issues, and resolve control panel problems.

services.title: LG Range & Oven Repair
services.description: Fix ProBake convection issues, burner problems, and smart features in LG ranges.

common_problems: LG washer OE error code (drainage issue)
LG dryer not heating or taking too long
LG dishwasher not cleaning dishes properly
LG ice maker not producing ice
